entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
